resources.string:
This Android application was developed by Miranda Verheij for the Avans course: "Java development and mobile, part 2: OO and mobile". 
 

The purpose of the app is to rent cars from others or to put your own car up for rental. 
 

I hope you like it!

Please enter the following information about the car you want to add: Brand, Type(ICE, FCEV, BEV), licence plate, number of seats and the cost per hour to rent the car. When you are done, click on the SEND button. A text will show up on the screen to comfirm that the car is added.
